Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Ripple makes you see an AI-generated evaluation of your resource before you can submit it. I have a general aversion to trusting generative AI for anything academic, but it did provide some good starting points.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher feedback was much more specific and helpful. Generative AI only gave general tips on what to improove.
